title: Welcome to Advent! 🎄
content: Welcome to your personal Advent calendar 2025! A new surprise awaits you every day. Enjoy this special season and let yourself be enchanted!

content: The first snowflakes are falling...

content: ¡San Nicolás estuvo aquí! St. Nicholas was here!

content: A special day in Mexico! While Germany celebrates with cookies, Mexico honors the Immaculate Conception. Let's bake some Polvorones (Mexican wedding cookies) together! 🇲🇽

title: Día de la Virgen de Guadalupe 🌹
content: Happy Day of Our Lady of Guadalupe! 🇲🇽 One of Mexico's most important holidays! Today we celebrate your beautiful culture and traditions. You're halfway through the calendar - the best is yet to come!

title: Snowy Landscape 🏔️
content: Nature in its winter dress

title: Las Posadas Begin! �🕯️
content: The first night of Las Posadas! 🇲🇽 For 9 nights, Mexicans reenact Mary and Joseph's journey to Bethlehem. A beautiful tradition blending with the German Christmas spirit! ¡Felices Posadas!

title: Christmas Tree Decorating 🎄✨
content: It's almost time! German traditions meet Mexican sparkle!

content: An evening full of fun - together or solo!

content: Christmas Eve is getting closer! The anticipation is growing! In Mexico, preparations for Noche Buena are in full swing! 🎉

title: Winter Evening 🌙
content: The most peaceful time of the year

title: Tomorrow is the Big Day! 🎅🎄
content: Christmas Eve is tomorrow! In Mexico, it's Noche Buena - a night of celebration, family, and delicious food like Bacalao and Ponche! Enjoy the final preparations for this magical night! 🇲🇽🇩🇪

title: ¡Feliz Navidad! Merry Christmas! 🎄🎁
content: This is your main gift! Let yourself be surprised and enjoy the holidays. From Germany to Mexico - love knows no borders! Te quiero mucho! ❤️🇲🇽🇩🇪
